# ui-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                          | Type                                                                                                                                                                 | Default |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `content`        | `content`         | The content to display in the tooltip                | `string`                                                                                                                                                             | `''`    |
| `disabled`       | `disabled`        | Whether the tooltip is disabled                      | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                            | `false` |
| `hideDelay`      | `hide-delay`      | Delay before hiding the tooltip (in ms)              | `number`                                                                                                                                                             | `0`     |
| `offsetDistance` | `offset-distance` | Offset from the trigger element (in px)              | `number`                                                                                                                                                             | `8`     |
| `placement`      | `placement`       | The placement of the tooltip relative to the trigger | `"bottom" \| "bottom-end" \| "bottom-start" \| "left" \| "left-end" \| "left-start" \| "right" \| "right-end" \| "right-start" \| "top" \| "top-end" \| "top-start"` | `'top'` |
| `showDelay`      | `show-delay`      | Delay before showing the tooltip (in ms)             | `number`                                                                                                                                                             | `0`     |
